caption.paragraph:
FIGURE 1.
Locheutis tianmushana
. a, adult; b, male genitalia, slide No. TZL19604; c, female genitalia, slide No. TZL20470. Scales: a = 2 mm; b = 0.2 mm; c = 0.5 mm.

subSubSection.paragraph: Redescription. Adult ( Fig. 1a ). Wingspan 15.5−22.5 mm . Head dark brown, with purplish shine. Antenna lutescent, slightly shorter or nearly as long as forewing; scape blackish brown dorsally; flagellum ringed with brown. Labial palpus with second palpomere dark brown, mixed with white scales at base dorsally; third palpomere slender, about 1/2 as long as second, greyish white, with dense brown scales at base and apex. Thorax and tegula lutescent to yellowish white. Forewing lutescent to yellowish white, with scattered brown scales; costal margin black basally; discal, discocellular and plical spots blackish brown, irregular in shape, relatively small; subterminal fascia greyish brown, from distal 1/5 of costal margin extending to before tornus; terminal dots blackish brown, from preapex along termen to tornus; fringe lutescent. Hindwing greyish brown, costal margin greyish white along basal 2/3; fringe greyish brown. Fore- and midlegs blackish brown to greyish white. Hindleg greyish white, with dense brown scales on outer surface.
Distribution. China ( Fujian , Guangxi , Hunan , Zhejiang ).
Note. The female of this species is described for the first time.
